page.title: 13PADSTOW CHARITY MERRYMAKERS
page.content: The newest Charitable Organisation in Padstow has been formed in the last three years and is known as{The {Merrymakers.}Every Bank Holiday Monday and on some Saturdays during summer, a band of local people,dressed up in fancy dress,accompanying themselves on accordions,drums and various other instruments,parade through the streets calling in at the pubs on their way, collecting money wherever they go.The emphasis is on fun and every Christmas they share out the money between local charities and organisations,with the emphasis on those concerned with the youth of the town.The Merrymakers are a registered charity and are now beginning to become popular around the area, often being invited to take part in carnival parades.
